discourse_list.title: Solidity-related proposal re-opened: make copy / reference semantics more explicit

content.content: Solidity team lead Dr. Christian Reitwiessner originally opened the issue in June, 2017 but wishes for the discussion to begin again.   github.com/ethereum/solidity      Issue: Make copy / reference semantics more explicit  	 	opened by chriseth 	on 2017-06-21 	 	 	     	breaking change :warning:  	language design :rage4:       Related tweet: https://twitter.com/ethchris/status/1060829055556206592
content.GPT-summary: The Solidity team lead has reopened a proposal from 2017 regarding the explicitness of copy/reference semantics in the language. The author is asking for feedback and explaining the proposal. The post is related to auditing and reviewing the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
